segue_the_chain: From a track on the  album Electric Ladyland, to a track from Kirsty MacColl’s album ‘Electric Landlady’…

segue_dave.line: The Jimi Hendrix Experience broke up in 1969, and so did The Spencer Davis Group...
segue_dave.explanation: The Jimi Hendrix Experience was formed as a band in 1969 and The Spencer Davis Group was formed as a band in the same year.
